Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2010 08:54PM Radoyle1 wrote: I have just been diagnosed Stage 3B Breast Cancer and my surgeon has told me that it is treatable with drugs ie chemo, radiation and then surgery.  Has this happened to anyone else and has anyone else had his treatment in this order  I am at my wits end and I just don't know what to do with myself.  I'm 59 working in a job that I love.  Telling people is hard.
